testcase.name: create guest_session_id
testcase.system-out: * def port = karate.env == 'mock' ? read('start-mock.js')() : 8080 ........ passed * url 'http://localhost:' + port + '/guestsession' ........................ passed Given request { api_key : '1234'} ......................................... passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response contains { "success":true, guest_session_id: '#uuid', expires_at: '#notnull' } . passed And def guest_session_id1 = response.guest_session_id ..................... passed Given path guest_session_id1 .............................................. passed When method get ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response contains { "success":true, guest_session_id: '#uuid', expires_at: '#notnull' } . passed When method get ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response contains [{ "success":true, guest_session_id: '#(guest_session_id1)', expires_at: '#notnull' }] . passed Given request { api_key: '12345' } ........................................ passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response contains { "success":true, guest_session_id: '#uuid', expires_at: '#notnull' } . passed And def guest_session_id2 = response.guest_session_id ..................... passed Given path guest_session_id2 .............................................. passed When method get ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response contains { "success":true, guest_session_id: '#uuid', expires_at: '#notnull' } . passed When method get ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response contains [{ "success":true, guest_session_id: '#(guest_session_id1)', expires_at: '#notnull' },{ "success":true, guest_session_id: '#(guest_session_id2)', expires_at: '#notnull' }] . passed Given request { guest_session_id: '#(guest_session_id2)' } ................ passed When method delete ........................................................ passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed
